bottle.firstMeaning: a glass or plastic container with a narrow neck, used for storing drinks or other liquids.

pencil.secondMeaning: a set of light rays, lines, etc. converging to or diverging narrowly from a single point.
pencil.firstMeaning: an instrument for writing or drawing, consisting of a thin stick of graphite or a similar substance enclosed in a long thin piece of wood or fixed in a cylindrical case.

relax.secondMeaning: make (a rule or restriction) less strict.
relax.firstMeaning: make or become less tense or anxious.

computer.secondMeaning: a person who makes calculations, especially with a calculating machine.
computer.firstMeaning: an electronic device for storing and processing data, typically in binary form, according to instructions given to it in a variable program.

flag.secondMeaning: mark (an item) for attention or treatment in a specified way.
flag.firstMeaning: a piece of cloth or similar material, typically oblong or square, attachable by one edge to a pole or rope and used as the symbol or emblem of a country or institution or as a decoration during public festivities.

need.firstMeaning: require (something) because it is essential or very important rather than just desirable.
